data.name: Age
data.comment: Prompt for a participant's age in years.

data.name: Author
data.comment: Dashboard prompt for entering a book author

data.name: Authorization Code
data.comment: A code used to grant more privileges to an administrative user

data.name: Branch
data.comment: Prompt for a participant's library branch from a drop-down list, examples might be 'Aguila Library' or 'Mesquite Library' or 'Sunset Library'

data.name: Challenges
data.comment: Navigation bar link to Challenges

data.name: Charter School
data.comment: A school type - charter school

data.name: Confirm New Password
data.comment: Prompt for a participant to enter their new password again to ensure they did not make a typo.

data.name: Confirm Password
data.comment: Prompt for a participant to enter their password again to ensure they did not make a typo.

data.name: Could not create your account: {0}
data.comment: Error creating the participant's account, {0} is replaced with the explanation as to why

data.name: Could not find username '{0}'.
data.comment: Could not find a username when a participant is trying to authenticate.

data.name: DashboardSecretCodeExplanation
data.value: Secret codes can be found by attending library events and on promotional materials. If you find one, enter it below!
data.comment: Dashboard explanation of what secret codes are

data.name: Email Address
data.comment: Prompt for a participant's email address

data.name: Email and Phone Number are not required however at least one is needed in order to be eligible for prizes.
data.value: Email and Phone Number are not required however at least one is needed in order to be eligible for prizes.
data.comment: Explanation about contact information being necessary to win prizes.

data.name: Enter {0} read
data.comment: Dashboard entry of activity performed, {0} is plural (for example "minutes" or "pages")

data.name: Events
data.comment: Navigation bar link to Events

data.name: First Name
data.comment: Prompt for a participant's first name (given name, forename, Christian name)

data.name: Forgot Password
data.comment: Title of the page for sending a participant their password recovery link

data.name: Forgot your password?
data.comment: Link for a participant to click if they've forgotten their password

data.name: Forgot your username?
data.comment: Link for a participant to click if they've forgotten their username

data.name: Home
data.comment: Navigation bar link to home page

data.name: Homeschooled
data.comment: A school type - homeschooled

data.name: I read a book!
data.comment: Dashboard button for logging activity of reading one book

data.name: I will {0}
data.comment: Daily personal goal, an explanation of activity, {0} is the action such as "read". See '{0} a day' for completion of this sentence - when combined they will say something similar to "I will read _ minutes a day"

data.name: Is this your first time participating?
data.value: Is this your first time participating?
data.comment: Prompt for a participant about if this is their first time participating in the program.

data.name: This website relies on JavaScript. Please enable JavaScript in your browser to get the best experience.
data.value: This website relies on JavaScript. Please enable JavaScript in your browser to get the best experience.
data.comment: Text to display if the user's browser does not have JavaScript functional

data.name: Join
data.comment: Navigation bar link or page title for join/sign up

data.name: Join!
data.comment: Text of the button to create a participant account

data.name: Language
data.comment: Navigation bar drop-down for language selection

data.name: Last Name
data.comment: Prompt for a participant's last name (surname, family name)

data.name: Log {0}
data.comment: Dashboard submit button for activity performed, {0} is plural (for example "minutes" or "pages")

data.name: Mail
data.comment: Navigation bar link to in-software mail facility

data.name: Menu
data.comment: Text for display when the window is small to expand the top navigation bar

data.name: Mission Control
data.comment: Navigation bar link to system administration area (colloquially how NASA refers to the mission control center/operations center)

data.name: My Profile
data.comment: Navigation bar link to the participant's user profile

data.name: New Password
data.comment: Prompt for a participant's new password

data.name: No
data.comment: No, negative response to inquiry

data.name: Once the program starts, you will enter your activity right here!
data.value: Once the program starts, you will enter your activity right here!
data.comment: Dashboard explanation that the program hasn't started yet and what to do once it has

data.name: Participate in program activities to earn badges!
data.value: Participate in program activities to earn badges!
data.comment: Dashboard text displayed when the participant has no badges.

data.name: Password
data.comment: Prompt for a participant's password to access the system.

data.name: Password and password confirmation do not match.
data.value: Password and password confirmation do not match.
data.comment: Validation prompt explaining that the password and password confirmation fields do not match.

data.name: Password Recovery
data.comment: Title of the page for allowing a participant to reset their password

data.name: Permission denied.
data.comment: General message when a participant does not have permission to execute an action.

data.name: Phone Number
data.comment: Prompt for a participant's telephone number

data.name: Please correct the issues with your password.
data.value: Please correct the issues with your password.
data.comment: Validation prompt if there are issues with the participant's password on the join form.

data.name: Please let us know if this is your first time participating in the program.
data.value: Please let us know if this is your first time participating in the program.
data.comment: Validation prompt if the participant did not select whether or not this is their first time participating in the program.

data.name: Please let us know if you would like to receive emails throughout the program.
data.value: Please let us know if you would like to receive emails throughout the program.
data.comment: Validation prompt if the participant did not select whether or not they want to receive periodic emails during the program.

data.name: Please select a branch.
data.comment: Validation prompt if the participant did not select a library branch.

data.name: Please select a program.
data.comment: Validation prompt if no value was selected for the program from a drop-down and it's required, examples might be 'Adult' or 'Teen' - the context is that of a summer or winter library reading program

data.name: Please select a system.
data.comment: Validation prompt if the participant did not select a library system.

data.name: Please select a value for {0}.
data.comment: No value was selected for the field and it's required, {0} is the field name (such as 'System' or 'Branch')

data.name: Private School
data.comment: A school type - private school

data.name: Program
data.comment: Prompt for a participant's program selection from a drop-down list, examples might be 'Adult' or 'Teen' - the context is that of a summer or winter library reading program

data.name: Public School
data.comment: A school type - public school

data.name: Registration for {0} is not open yet.
data.value: Registration for {0} is not open yet.
data.comment: Alert shown to a participant if they attempt to join prior to registration opening for the program; {0} is the name of the program

data.name: Reset Password
data.comment: Button to save a participant's new password

data.name: Return to Sign In
data.comment: Button to take a participant back to the sign in page

data.name: School
data.comment: Prompt for the name of the participant's school

data.name: School District
data.comment: Prompt for a participant's school district

data.name: School not listed
data.comment: Prompt for a participant indicating their school is not listed

data.name: School Type
data.comment: Prompt for a participant's school type

data.name: Secret Code
data.comment: Dashboard prompt for entering a secret code

data.name: See more of your badges in your history!
data.value: See more of your badges in your history!
data.comment: Dashboard link to view participant's history, displayed underneath their badges

data.name: See your activity history.
data.comment: Dashboard link to view history of program activities

data.name: Send Recovery Email
data.comment: Button to send a user their username or password recovery email

data.name: Set a personal goal
data.comment: Prompt participant for a personal goal when participating in the program

data.name: Sign in
data.comment: Navigation bar link to sign in/authenticate

data.name: Sign out
data.comment: Navigation bar link to sign out

data.name: Someone has already chosen that username, please try another.
data.value: Someone has already chosen that username, please try another.
data.comment: Validation prompt if the username is already in use.

data.name: Step {0}
data.comment: Which step of a process we are on, {0} is replaced with a number like 1, 2, or 3

data.name: Submit Code
data.comment: Dashboard button to submit a secret code

data.name: System
data.comment: Prompt for a participant's library system from a drop-down list, examples might be 'Maricopa County Library District' or 'Phoenix Public Library'

data.name: That username is available!
data.comment: Validation prompt that the username selected is available.

data.name: The branch you've selected is not valid, please select another branch.
data.value: The branch you've selected is not valid, please select another branch.
data.comment: The participant has selected a branch that is not valid. This should not occur but could happen if a branch became invalid while they were signing up.

data.name: The program has ended, thanks for participating!
data.value: The program has ended, thanks for participating!
data.comment: Dashboard information about the program ending.

data.name: The program is not accepting registrations at this time.
data.value: The program is not accepting registrations at this time.
data.comment: A participant tried to sign up when the program was not open for sign-ups.

data.name: The program is not open for activity at this time.
data.value: The program is not open for activity at this time.
data.comment: A participant tried to enter activity when the program was not permitting it.

data.name: The program you've selected is not valid, please select another program.
data.value: The program you've selected is not valid, please select another program.
data.comment: The participant has selected a program that is not valid. This should not occur but could happen if a program became invalid while they were signing up.

data.name: The school you've selected is not valid, please select another school.
data.value: The school you've selected is not valid, please select another school.
data.comment: The participant has selected a school that is not valid. This should not occur but could happen if a school became invalid while they were signing up.

data.name: The system you've selected is not valid, please select another system.
data.value: The system you've selected is not valid, please select another system.
data.comment: The participant has selected a system that is not valid. This should not occur but could happen if a system became invalid while they were signing up.

data.name: The {0} field is required.
data.comment: No value was entered for the field and it's required, {0} is the field name (such as 'First Name')

data.name: This program may be better-suited to your age:
data.value: This program may be better-suited to your age:
data.comment: Validation prompt that the user should perhaps select another program - this text is followed by the name of the recommended program.

data.name: Title
data.comment: Dashboard prompt for entering a book title

data.name: To receive email updates please supply an email address to send them to.
data.value: To receive email updates please supply an email address to send them to.
data.comment: Validation prompt if the participant requested email updates but neglected to provide an email address.

data.name: Toggle navigation
data.comment: Text for screen readers when the window is small to expand the top navigation when it is collapsed

data.name: Token
data.comment: A set of characters that a participant enters to verify their identity, typically alphanumeric

data.name: Username
data.comment: Prompt for a participant's unique username which is used to access the system.

data.name: Username Recovery
data.comment: Title of the page for sending a participant their username if they've forgotten it

data.name: Validate code
data.comment: Text of the button used to validate an Authorization Code

data.name: Welcome {0}!
data.comment: Dashboard friendly greeting, {0} is the participant's first name

data.name: Yes
data.comment: Yes, positive response to inquiry

data.name: You can join {0} on {1}.
data.comment: Alert shown to a participant if they attempt to join prior to the start of the program; {0} is the name of the program, {1} is a the date the program starts

data.name: You have {0} points.
data.comment: Dashboard display of current points, {0} is a number of points they've earned

data.name: Your badges
data.comment: Dashboard link to view participant's history, displayed above their badges on the dashboard

data.name: Your password must be at least 6 characters long and include a number.
data.value: Your password must be at least 6 characters long and include a number.
data.comment: Password requirements shown to participants.

data.name: Joined {0}!
data.comment: Confirmation to the participant that they have joined the program. {0} is replaced with the name of the program.

data.name: When you complete {0}, you will earn {1} and a badge.
data.value: When you complete {0}, you will earn {1} and a badge.
data.comment: Inform the participant that when they complete a task, they receive a reward and a badge. {0} is the task, {1} is the reward.

data.name: When you complete {0}, you will earn {1}.
data.value: When you complete {0}, you will earn {1}.
data.comment: Inform the participant that when they complete a task, they receive a reward. {0} is the task, {1} is the reward.

data.name: Thanks for participating in {0}!
data.comment: Thank visitors for participating in the program. {0} is replaced with the name of the program.

data.name: You can still sign in to review your history and achievements.
data.value: You can still sign in to review your history and achievements.
data.comment: Inform the participant that they can review the records of their participation and their accomplishments by signing in.

data.name: ZIP Code
data.comment: Prompt for a participant's ZIP code or postal code

data.name: {0} - Join Now!
data.comment: Page title/call to action for joining; {0} is the name of the program

data.name: {0} a day
data.comment: Daily personal goal, completion of sentence, {0} is a plural activity description such as "minutes". See 'I will {0}' for the first half of this sentence - when combined they will say something similar to "I will read _ minutes a day"

data.name: {0} has ended, please join us next time!
data.value: {0} has ended, please join us next time!
data.comment: Alert shown to a participant if they access after the program has ended; {0} is the name of the program

data.name: A list of usernames associated with the email address '{0}' has been sent.
data.value: A list of usernames associated with the email address '{0}' has been sent.
data.comment: Informing the user that a list of usernames email has been sent; {0} is the associated email address

data.name: A password recovery email has been sent to the email for username '{0}'.
data.value: A password recovery email has been sent to the email for username '{0}'.
data.comment: Informing the user that a password recovery email has been sent; {0} is their username

data.name: Could not recover username(s): {0}
data.comment: A username recovery email could not be sent for the reason specified in {0}

data.name: Password reset for: {0}
data.comment: Telling the user that their password was reset, {0} is their username

data.name: Password reset token '{0}' has expired, please start the password reset process over.
data.value: Password reset token '{0}' has expired, please start the password reset process over.
data.comment: Password reset token has expired because the user waited too long between asking to reset their password and clicking the link. They must restart the password reset process and generate a new token.

data.name: Password reset token '{0}' is not valid, please start the password reset process over.
data.value: Password reset token '{0}' is not valid, please start the password reset process over.
data.comment: Password reset token is not valid, they must restart the password reset process and generate a new token.

data.name: The program is not accepting sign-ins at this time.
data.value: The program is not accepting sign-ins at this time.
data.comment: A participant tried to sign in when the program was not open for sign-ins.

data.name: The provided password is incorrect.
data.comment: Validation prompt that the user entered an invalid password.

data.name: There are no usernames associated with the email address: {0}.
data.value: There are no usernames associated with the email address: {0}.
data.comment: An attempt was made to find usernames associated with an email address and none were found; {0} is the email address that was searched for

data.name: Unable to reset password: {0}
data.comment: Telling the user why their password could not be reset, {0} is the explanation

data.name: Username '{0}' does not have an email address configured.
data.value: Username '{0}' does not have an email address configured.
data.comment: The user does not have an email address configured so we cannot email them to perform a password reset; {0} is their username

data.name: Please enter a whole number greater than 0.
data.value: Please enter a whole number greater than 0.
data.comment: Validation prompt if the participant entered a non-integer, number less than 0, or 0.

data.name: When providing an author of a book, please also provide a title.
data.value: When providing an author of a book, please also provide a title.
data.comment: Validation prompt if the participant entered an author but not the title of a book.

data.name: Sorry, we couldn't log your activity: {0}
data.value: Sorry, we couldn't log your activity: {0}
data.comment: Due to a software problem, the participant's activity could not be saved.

data.name: Thanks! We'll let you know when you can join the program.
data.value: Thanks! We'll let you know when you can join the program.
data.comment: Inform the participant that we will email them when they can participate in the program.

data.name: The field {0} must be a string or array type with a maximum length of '{1}'.
data.value: Please enter less than {1} characters for {0}.
data.comment: Validation prompt that a particular field - name replaces {0} - has a maximum allowed length of characters - replaced by {1}.

data.name: The field {0} must be a string or array type with a minimum length of '{1}'.
data.value: Please enter more than {1} characters for {0}.
data.comment: Validation prompt that a particular field - name replaces {0} - has a minimum allowed length of characters - replaced by {1}.

data.name: The {0} field is not a valid e-mail address.
data.value: The {0} field is not a valid email address.
data.comment: Validation prompt for an invalid email address.

data.name: The {0} field is not a valid phone number.
data.value: The {0} field is not a valid phone number.
data.comment: Validation prompt for an invalid telephone number.

data.name: Join Now!
data.comment: Shown on top of join page as participant signs up for the program after the name of the program and a hyphen (e.g. "The Great Reading Adventure - <this message>")

data.name: My progress
data.comment: Display prior to progress bar showing the participant's progress in the program

data.name: Final Step
data.comment: Text inside a button to indicate clicking takes the user to the last step of a multi-step process.

data.name: Next Step
data.comment: Text inside a button to indicate clicking takes the user to the next step of a multi-step process. Often pictured next to a right arrow.

data.name: The password you've provided is too short, it must be at least {0} characters long.
data.value: The password you've provided is too short, it must be at least {0} characters long.
data.comment: Password provided is two short, {0} will be replaced with the required number of characters.

data.name: You must include a lowercase letter in your password.
data.value: You must include a lowercase letter in your password.
data.comment: Password provided does not contain a lowercase letter and must contain at least one.

data.name: You must include a number in your password.
data.value: You must include a number in your password.
data.comment: Password provided does not contain a digit and must contain at least one.

data.name: You must include a special character in your password.
data.value: You must include a special character in your password.
data.comment: Password provided does not contain any symbols (e.g. !, @, #) and must contain at least one.

data.name: You must include an uppercase letter in your password.
data.value: You must include an uppercase letter in your password.
data.comment: Password provided does not contain an uppercase letter and must contain at least one.

data.name: The goal of this program is {0} points.
data.value: The goal of this program is {0} points.
data.comment: Inform the user how many points are required to reach the goal of the program, {0} is replaced with a number of points.

data.name: The username and password entered do not match.
data.value: The username and password entered do not match.
data.comment: Prompt the user that the username and password entered are not accurate.

data.name: Sign in to {0}
data.comment: Prompt a user to sign in to the site, {0} is replaced with the name of the site

data.name: Remind Me!
data.comment: Submission button text for the participant's email address to be reminded prior to the program starting.

data.name: Submit your email address below and we'll remind you when the program starts.
data.value: Submit your email address below and we'll remind you when the program starts.
data.comment: Prompt for a participant's email to send a reminder when the program starts.

data.name: Add a calendar reminder
data.comment: Landing page button to download a calendar reminder file (when opened it will add a calendar reminder on the visitor's computer)

data.name: For more information about this reading program, visit your local library!
data.value: For more information about this reading program, visit your local library!
data.comment: Landing page call to action for learning more

data.name: Join to get started on your reading adventure!
data.value: Join to get started on your reading adventure!
data.comment: Landing page text encouraging registration once the program has started.

data.name: Our program starts soon but you can join now to be ready to go when the program starts!
data.value: Our program starts soon but you can join now to be ready to go when the program starts!
data.comment: Landing page text encouraging registration once registration is open but prior to the program start date.

data.name: Reading for 20 minutes a day helps build a strong lifelong reading habit.
data.value: Reading for 20 minutes a day helps build a strong lifelong reading habit.
data.comment: Landing page message to encourage reading 20 minutes a day.

data.name: Reading is fundamental for developing literacy skills!
data.value: Reading is fundamental for developing literacy skills!
data.comment: Landing page message informing that reading is fundamental for developing literacy skills.

data.name: Thanks for participating in {0}. You can still sign in to review your history and achievements.
data.value: Thanks for participating in {0}. You can still sign in to review your history and achievements.
data.comment: Landing page text thanking visitors for participating after the program has ended when they can still log in to see their history and achievements. {0} is replaced with the name of the program.

data.name: Welcome to {0}.
data.comment: Landing page welcome text; {0} is replaced with the name of the site.

data.name: When the program starts, you'll be able to join right here. Come back soon!
data.value: When the program starts, you'll be able to join right here. Come back soon!
data.comment: Landing page message to show visitors when the start date of the program isn't specified.

data.name: While you're there, go on a journey of discovery! Visit fabulous destinations such as Hogwarts, Narnia, Oz, and Middle Earth!
data.value: While you're there, go on a journey of discovery! Visit fabulous destinations such as Hogwarts, Narnia, Oz, and Middle Earth!
data.comment: Landing page after the call to action for learning more; things to experience at the library

data.name: Would you like a reminder email for our next reading program? Enter your email address below and click the 'Remind me' button and we'll send you a reminder when you can join.
data.value: Would you like a reminder email for our next reading program? Enter your email address below and click the 'Remind me' button and we'll send you a reminder when you can join.
data.comment: Landing page text asking if visitors want a reminder for the next program.

data.name: You can join our program starting on {0}!
data.value: You can join our program starting on {0}!
data.comment: Landing page message to show visitors when the start date of the program is; {0} is replaced with the start date of the program.

data.name: You must enter a code!
data.comment: Validation prompt if the user clicked the secret code submission button without entering a secret code.

data.name: Can we send you a few emails throughout the program?
data.value: Can we send you a few emails throughout the program?
data.comment: Prompt as to whether or not emails can be sent throughout the program - this is user configurable so it may not match

data.name: All Programs
data.comment: Select all programs in a program selection drop-down list

data.name: Clear
data.comment: Button text to clear out entries from a form

data.name: Community Experiences
data.comment: Name for community experiences

data.name: Distance
data.comment: Column title showing events: approximate distance from the search location

data.name: End Date
data.comment: Prompt to select an ending date for a date range

data.name: Enter an address or ZIP code
data.value: Enter an address or ZIP code
data.comment: Prompt to enter an address or ZIP code to search for events

data.name: Enter text to search for an event here
data.value: Enter text to search for an event here
data.comment: Prompt to enter text to search for events

data.name: Events & Community Experiences
data.comment: Page title for showing Events and Community Experiences

data.name: Find
data.comment: Button text to perform a search

data.name: Location
data.comment: Prompt to select the name of a location

data.name: Near Location
data.comment: Prompt to search for items near this location

data.name: No Events
data.comment: Explain that no matching events were found when a search was performed

data.name: Search Title & Description
data.comment: Prompt to search by title and description

data.name: Start Date
data.comment: Prompt to select a beginning date for a date range

data.name: What
data.comment: Column title showing events: what the event is

data.name: When
data.comment: Column title showing events: when the event occurs

data.name: Where
data.comment: Column title showing events: where the event occurs

data.name: {0} at {1}
data.comment: When an event is at a specific time on a date it will displayed using this template; {0} is the date, {1} is the time

data.name: {0} mile(s)
data.comment: Express a distance; {0} replaced with the number of mile(s)

data.name: Use my ZIP code
data.comment: Button text when searching to use the current participant's ZIP code

data.name: Avatar
data.comment: A representation of the participant that they can customize (e.g. with different outfits or accessories)

data.name: Avatar saved.
data.comment: Tell the participant that their avatar changes have been saved.

data.name: Back
data.comment: Navigate back to the prior page

data.name: Back to Challenges
data.comment: Button text to return to the list of challenges

data.name: Badge
data.comment: Column heading showing which badge will be unlocked when a task is completed

data.name: Category
data.comment: Prompt or display title for which category an item is in (such as a challenge)

data.name: Challenge Group: {0}
data.comment: Display which challenge group was selected; {0} is replaced with the name of the challenge group

data.name: Challenge: {0}
data.comment: Page title for viewing the details of a specific challenge; {0} will be replaced with the name of the challenge

data.name: Completed on: {0}
data.comment: Challenge task completion date, {0} is replaced with the date the task was completed

data.name: Completed!
data.comment: Status to show when a challenge or challenge task is marked complete.

data.name: Could not save avatar: {0}
data.comment: Tell the participant that we could not save their avatar changes, {0} will be replaced with a reason why

data.name: Couldn't save your avatar, sorry!
data.comment: Apologize to the user for a technical problem while saving their customized avatar.

data.name: Download to Share
data.comment: Download an image in order to share it on social media platforms

data.name: Enter text to search for a challenge here
data.value: Enter text to search for a challenge here
data.comment: Prompt to enter text to search for challenges

data.name: My Favorites
data.comment: Button which will display to a participant items that they flagged as their favorites

data.name: Name
data.comment: Column heading for the name of an item (like a challenge or an event)

data.name: No Challenges
data.comment: Explain that no matching challenges were found when a search was performed

data.name: Please customize your avatar and save it, then you can share it!
data.value: Please customize your avatar and save it, then you can share it!
data.comment: Participant has tried to share their avatar before saving it, inform them they must customize and save it first and then they can try sharing it.

data.name: Points you'll earn
data.comment: Column heading showing many points a participant will earn for completing a task

data.name: Progress
data.comment: Column heading showing far a participant is towards completing an item (i.e. their progress)

data.name: Read {1}
data.comment: Challenge task of book with a link (replacing {0}) and a book title (replacing {1})

data.name: Read {1} by {2}
data.comment: Challenge task of book with a link (replacing {0}), a book title (replacing {1}) and the author of the book (replacing {2})

data.name: Read {0}
data.comment: Challenge tasks of book with the book title replacing {0}

data.name: Read {0} by {1}
data.comment: Challenge task of a book with the book title replacing {0} and the author replacing {1}

data.name: Save
data.comment: Button text for saving changes

data.name: Save My Favorites
data.comment: Button allowing a participant to save their selected favorites

data.name: Share
data.comment: Button text for sharing avatar images

data.name: Share Your Avatar
data.comment: Title for the avatar sharing page

data.name: View Attachment
data.comment: Button text to view an attached file to a challenge task

data.name: Your status has been saved!
data.comment: Participant's status on completing tasks has been saved.

data.name: Your status has been saved. You have completed {0}% of the required tasks for the challenge: {1}!
data.value: Your status has been saved. You have completed {0}% of the required tasks for the challenge: {1}!
data.comment: Participant's status on completing tasks has been saved, {0} replaced with the percentage of the required tasks which have been completed and {1} is replaced with the name of the challenge.

data.name: {0} point
data.comment: Indicating a single point, {0} will be replaced with 1

data.name: {0} points
data.comment: Indicating a number of points other than 1, {0} will be replaced with 0 or a number more than 1

data.name: {0} task
data.comment: Indicating a single challenge task, {0} will be replaced with 1

data.name: {0} tasks
data.comment: Indicating a number of challenge tasks other than 1, {0} will be replaced with 0 or a number more than 1

data.name: Back to Events & Community Experiences
data.comment: Button text for returning to the list of events or community experiences

data.name: More information
data.comment: Text shown before a link to an external site where the user can find more information about an event

data.name: Related Challenge
data.comment: Text shown before a link to challenge related to a shown event

data.name: Related Challenges
data.comment: Text shown before a link to multiple challenges related to a shown event

data.name: This event is limited to the program: {0}
data.value: This event is limited to the program: {0}
data.comment: Shown to a user when an event is limited to a specific program.

data.name: You are now unsubscribed and will not receive any more emails from {0}.
data.value: You are now unsubscribed and will not receive any more emails from {0}.
data.comment: Message to the user that they've unsubscribed and won't receive any more emails. {0} is replaced with the name of the site.

data.name: {0} - registration opens {1}
data.comment: Page title prior to registration, {0} is replaced with the name of the site, {1} with the date registration opens

data.name: Old Password
data.comment: Prompt a participant for their old password when they want to change their password

data.name: Activity
data.comment: Title for the participant's activity

data.name: Add an existing participant into your {0}, if that participant is the head of a {0} their {0} members will be moved into your {0} as well.
data.value: Add an existing participant into your {0}, if that participant is the head of a {0} their {0} members will be moved into your {0} as well.
data.comment: Explanation of how adding an existing participant into the current participant's Group or Family works. {0} is replaced with either "Family" or "Group"as translated in this file.

data.name: Add Existing Participant
data.comment: Title for area to add an existing program participant to the current participant's Family or Group

data.name: Add Participant
data.comment: Button text to add a participant to a Group or Family

data.name: Are you sure you want to delete this book from your book list:
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this book from your book list:
data.comment: Prompt for the user when they request to delete a book from the list; the book name is specified directly after this message is printed.

data.name: Book List
data.comment: Button to view the participant's book list.

data.name: Bundle Items
data.comment: Title for a pop-up showing a collection of avatar items awarded as a bundle

data.name: Cancel
data.comment: Button text to exit a dialog without saving changes.

data.name: Change Password
data.comment: Button to change the user's password.

data.name: Congratulations, you've earned a free book!
data.value: Congratulations, you've earned a free book!
data.comment: Message to the participant that they've earned a free book.

data.name: Date
data.comment: Heading or title to display a date

data.name: Delete
data.comment: Button text to delete an item.

data.name: Delete Book
data.comment: Title to delete a book from the participant's book list

data.name: Details
data.comment: Button to view more details about the currently shown record.

data.name: Donate your book
data.comment: Button text for the participant to donate their book to charity rather than redeem it for personal use.

data.name: Edit Book
data.comment: Title to edit a book in the participant's book list

data.name: Family
data.comment: Title shown when viewing a Family of participants. Will also be used in a sentence.

data.name: Free book code
data.comment: Description of the code a customer will use for obtaining their free book that they've earned.

data.name: Group
data.comment: Title shown when viewing a Group of participants. Will also be used in a sentence.

data.name: Group name
data.comment: The name for a group of participants, for example a summer camp name.

data.name: Group type
data.comment: The type for a group of participants, for example: summer camp or daycare

data.name: History
data.comment: Button to view the participant's history.

data.name: It appears that you have more than {0} members in your family. We'd like you to convert your family to a group in order to add more members.
data.value: It appears that you have more than {0} members in your family. We'd like you to convert your family to a group in order to add more members.
data.comment: The participant is attempting to add an additional user to their family which pushes them over the family/group threshold to turn them into a group.

data.name: No books logged.
data.comment: Message shown when the book list is viewed with no books in the log.

data.name: No history to display.
data.comment: Message shown when the history is viewed with no entries in the log.

data.name: Points
data.comment: Title for showing points earned by the participant

data.name: Redeem your code
data.comment: Button text for the participant to obtain their code for a free book.

data.name: Total Points
data.comment: Heading shown before the total number of participant's points

data.name: Update Group details
data.comment: Title for updating group details

data.name: Upgrade from Family to Group
data.comment: Title for interface to upgrade a Family to a Group

data.name: Upgrade to Group
data.comment: Button text for upgrading a family to a group

data.name: If you can't find something, please send us a mail and let us know what you were looking for, we'll do our best to help.
data.value: If you can't find something, please send us a mail and let us know what you were looking for, we'll do our best to help.
data.comment: Ask participant to use the in-software mail facility to contact site owners if they require assistance; {0} will be replaced automatically with the URL to the mail facility.

data.name: Page not found
data.comment: Page title and header for 404 not found error.

data.name: We couldn't find what you were looking for. Sorry about that!
data.value: We couldn't find what you were looking for. Sorry about that!
data.comment: Explain to user a 404 not found error.

data.name: Are you sure you wish to delete this mail: {0}
data.value: Are you sure you wish to delete this mail: {0}
data.comment: Confirm message deletion, {0} is replaced with the mail subject.

data.name: Back to Mailbox
data.comment: Button to return to the participant's mailbox

data.name: Delete Mail
data.comment: Header for delete mail page/dialog

data.name: Mail message
data.comment: Display prompt for mail content

data.name: Mail sent: {0}
data.comment: Inform a participant that their mail was sent, {0} is replaced with the subject of the mail.

data.name: Re: {0}
data.comment: The subject of a message is changed to this when it is replied to with {0} replaced with the original subject.

data.name: Read
data.comment: Button to read a mail.

data.name: Reply
data.comment: Button to reply to a mail

data.name: Reply to:
data.comment: Inform a participant what they are replying to, the subject is output after this message. Should end with an indicator that text follows such as a colon (:)

data.name: Send Mail
data.comment: Button to send a mail, also used as a page/dialog header

data.name: Send Reply
data.comment: Button to send a reply to a mail

data.name: Sent to you on {0}
data.comment: Inform a participant when a mail was sent to them.

data.name: Subject
data.comment: Header/display prompt for a mail subject

data.name: Subject: {0}
data.comment: Show the subject of a mail; {0} is replaced with the mail subject

data.name: There was an issue deleting that mail item.
data.value: There was an issue deleting that mail item.
data.comment: Unable to delete a mail due to a software error.

data.name: Unable to read mail: {0}
data.comment: Unable to display a mail due to a software error, {0} is replaced with the text of the error.

data.name: Unable to reply to mail: {0}
data.comment: Unable to reply to a mail due to a software error, {0} is replaced with the text of the error.

data.name: You currently have no mail.
data.comment: Inform a participant that their mailbox is empty.

data.name: You must select a branch.
data.comment: Inform the user they must select a library branch.

data.name: You must select a program.
data.comment: Inform the user they must select a program.

data.name: You must select a system.
data.comment: Inform the user they must select a library system.

data.name: Activity cannot be logged for this participant until they log in and answer a questionnaire.
data.value: Activity cannot be logged for this participant until they log in and answer a questionnaire.
data.comment: The designated participant must log in to complete a questionnaire before activity can be entered for them.

data.name: Add username
data.comment: Add a username for a participant who doesn't have one so that they can log in on their own

data.name: Apply
data.comment: Button text shown after a secret code entry field to apply the code

data.name: Book Code
data.comment: Column heading for free book codes/vendor codes, a participant redeems this to obtain their free book

data.name: Donate book
data.comment: Donate a free book for the currently-selected participant

data.name: New Mail!
data.comment: Tool tip to show when a user has new mail

data.name: Participant
data.comment: Column header to describe a person that is participating in the program

data.name: Redeem code
data.comment: Redeem a free book/vendor code for the currently-selected participant

data.name: Return to Top
data.comment: Link or button on the bottom of a page to return to the top of the page or list

data.name: Switch To
data.comment: Switched the logged in user to another participant

data.name: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
data.value: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
data.comment: The participant's session has expired, they must sign in again to access the application.

data.name: A {0} cannot be created at this time.
data.value: A {0} cannot be created at this time.
data.comment: Shown when an error occurs creating a family or group; {0} is replaced with the translation of Group or Family

data.name: Add existing participant to your {0}
data.comment: Add an existing participant to a group/family, {0} is replaced with the translation of Group or Family

data.name: Click below to create a {0}
data.comment: Instruction to click a link below in order to create a group or family, {0} is replaced with the translation of Group or Family

data.name: Register new {0} Member
data.comment: Register a new member, {0} is replaced with the translation of Group or Family

data.name: You are in the group: {0}
data.comment: Text indicating that the participant is a member of a group; {0} is replaced with the name of the group.

data.name: You are leader of the group: {1}
data.value: You are leader of the group: {1}
data.comment: Text with a link indicating that the participant is the leader of a group; {0} is replaced with the URL to group management and {1} will be replaced with the name of the group.

data.name: Back to {0}
data.comment: Return to the prior page; {0} will be replaced with the name of the page

data.name: minutes
data.comment: Minutes, plural

data.name: Activity applied!
data.comment: Resposne message after activity has been applied to a family or group.

data.name: Added {0} to your {1}!
data.comment: Inform that a participant was added to a family or group; {0} is the participant's full name, {1} is the translation of Group or Family

data.name: All selected participants already have that Secret Code.
data.value: All selected participants already have that Secret Code.
data.comment: Participant tried to applly a secret code to a family/group but they've all already entered that secret code.

data.name: Could not create {0}: {1}
data.comment: An item could not be created, {0} indicates what was attempted to be created at {1} indicates why it could not be.

data.name: Could not remove {0}: {1}
data.comment: An item could not be removed, {0} indicates what was attempted to be removed and {1} indicates why it could not be.

data.name: Could not update {0}: {1}.
data.comment: An item could not be updated, {0} indicates what was attempted to be updated and {1} inticates why it could not be.

data.name: Group name is required.
data.comment: When promoting a family to a group it is necessary for the participant to supply a name for the group which they have neglected to do.

data.name: Please select some participants first.
data.comment: A participant is trying to apply actions to their family/group but has not selected any family/group members.

data.name: Removed: {0}
data.comment: An item was removed, {0} indicates what that item is (typically by name)

data.name: Required fields are blank.
data.comment: Information was submitted but some required fields were not provided.

data.name: Secret code applied!
data.comment: Response message after a secret code has been applied to a family or group.

data.name: See the items you unlocked.
data.comment: Hyperlinked text to navigate a participant to avatar parts that were unlocked as part of a bundle.

data.name: Something went wrong, please send us a mail with details of what you were attempting to do.
data.value: Something went wrong, please send us a mail with details of what you were attempting to do.
data.comment: An application error occurred; message suggests to the user that they should use the mail system in the application to let the administrators know what went wrong.

data.name: Unable to add: {0}
data.comment: An attempt to add something failed, {0} describes what could not be added.

data.name: Unable to change your password: {0}
data.comment: Changing passwords failed; {0} is replaced with why the process failed.

data.name: Updated: {0}
data.comment: An item was updated, {0} indicated what that item was (typically by name)

data.name: You are now signed in as {0}.
data.value: You are now signed in as {0}.
data.comment: Message displayed when someone in a group/family logs in as a member of their group/family.

data.name: You must enter an amount.
data.comment: Inform a participant that they must enter an amount in order to apply an activity to multiple members of their family/group.

data.name: Your password has been changed.
data.comment: Inform a participant that their password was successfully changed.

data.name: and other activities
data.comment: Displayed when there are more than a few notifications; links to the participant's profile so they can view their other accomplishments.

data.name: You've successfully joined {0}!
data.comment: Message shown when a participant signs up, {0} is replaced with the name of the site.

data.name: and their {0}
data.comment: When one family/group is absorbed into another, this is displayed; {0} is replaced with the translated term for Group or Family

data.name: Profile updated.
data.comment: Message shown once a profile update is saved.

data.name: Select a Bundle
data.comment: A bundle is a collection of avatar parts that are unlocked during participation. This text goes in a drop-down allowing the user to select a particular bundle to explore the parts it contains.

data.name: Add Book
data.comment: Button text and header text for when a participant adds a book to their book list.

data.name: {0} - See you soon!
data.comment: Title of the exit Web page once the user logs out, {0} is replaced with the name of the site.

data.name: Continue your adventure with a visit to your local library in person or online! Books, movies, audiobooks, graphic novels all await!
data.value: Continue your adventure with a visit to your local library in person or online! Books, movies, audiobooks, graphic novels all await!
data.comment: Call to action on the exit page after a participant logs out; shown next to information about their library (URL, telephone number, address).

data.name: Your adventure is not over yet!
data.value: Your adventure is not over yet!
data.comment: Title on the exit page after a participant logs out.

data.name: Illustration of a forest.
data.comment: The alt tag on the front page banner image for those who cannot see the image; the image is an illustration of a forest.

data.name: The unsubscribe token could not be found, please log in to change your preferences.
data.value: The unsubscribe token could not be found, please log in to change your preferences.
data.comment: Message shown to a participant if they've clicked an unsubscribe link but there has been an issue looking their record up.

data.name: You are already unsubscribed from emails.
data.value: You are already unsubscribed from emails.
data.comment: Message shown if the participant has clicked an unsubscribe link when they are unsubscribed.

data.name: To activate an authorization code, please sign in or join.
data.value: To activate an authorization code, please sign in or join.
data.comment: If they desire to join with an authorization code and, tried accessing Mission Control's AuthorizationCode

data.name: Streaming Events
data.comment: Navigation link and title for streaming events

data.name: Not streaming yet
data.comment: Button text when streaming the event is not available yet

data.name: Stream
data.comment: Column heading displayed in streaming event list which contains the streaming buttons

data.name: Stream Now!
data.comment: Button that participants click to see a streaming event

data.name: Program is over
data.comment: Disabled button for streaming programs if it is over

data.name: Stream starts
data.comment: Heading for the field with the date and time that a streaming event begins

data.name: You've earned a free book! Head over to My Profile page to choose what to do with it.
data.value: You've earned a free book! Head over to My Profile page to choose what to do with it.
data.comment: Dashboard message telling participant they've earned a free book and where to go to redeem it.

data.name: Choose an option:
data.comment: Inform a participant that they may choose one of the following options

data.name: Confirm
data.comment: Button text for confirming information entered

data.name: Receive an e-audiobook
data.comment: Button text for the participant to redeem their free book as an e-audiobook

data.name: You've earned a free book! Head over to My Profile page by {1} to choose what to do with it.
data.value: You've earned a free book! Head over to My Profile page by {1} to choose what to do with it.
data.comment: Dashboard message telling participant they've earned a free book, when it expires, and where to go to redeem it; {0} is replaced with the date the code expires.

data.name: Could not find the requested event.
data.value: Could not find the requested event.
data.comment: Event details were requested but the event could not be found

data.name: Sign in to access streaming programs!
data.value: Sign in to access streaming programs!
data.comment: This message is displayed to a user who wants to view a streaming program but isn't logged in.

data.name: Sign in to stream!
data.comment: Button shown to unauthenticated users encouraging them to sign in and stream programs.

data.name: This streaming event has ended.
data.comment: Message indicating that a streaming event is no longer available to view.

data.name: This streaming event has not started yet.
data.value: This streaming event has not started yet.
data.comment: Message indicating that a streaming event is not yet available.
